mapper.select: select * from tb_video_board where category1 = #{category1} and category2 like '%' ||#{category2}|| '%'
mapper.update: update tb_video_board set readcount = readcount+1 where v_no =#{v_no}
mapper.select: select v_no, title, content, category1, category2, url, readcount from (select rownum, v_no, title, content, category1, category2, url, readcount from (select * from tb_video_board where category1 = '맨몸운동' order by readcount desc) where rownum <9)
select * from tb_video_board where category1=#{category1} and category2=#{category2} order by readcount desc
select count(*) from tb_video_board where category1='맨몸운동' and category2=#{category2}
select * from tb_video_board where category1='맨몸운동' and title like '%' ||#{keyWord}|| '%'

select * from (select v_no,NVL(likecount, 0) as tt, title,content,category1,category2,url,readcount from tb_video_board left outer join ( select v_no, count(*) as likecount from tb_like group by v_no ) using ( v_no )) where category1=#{category1} and category2=#{category2} order by tt desc
select count(*) from tb_video_board where category1='맨몸운동' and title like '%' ||#{keyWord}|| '%'

select v_no, title, content, category1, category2, url,readcount from( select rownum as rnum,v_no, title, content, category1, category2, url,readcount from( (select v_no,NVL(likecount, 0) as tt, title,content,category1,category2,url,readcount from tb_video_board left outer join ( select v_no, count(*) as likecount from tb_like group by v_no ) using ( v_no )) order by tt desc ))where rnum<11
select category1, sum(readcount) from tb_video_board group by category1
